title: Checkable Memo
content: Privacy policy on Checkable Memo is provided on this page.

title: Privacy policy
content:
Personal data collection This application doesn’t attempt to collect any personal information. Thus, no permission is requested.
Data encryption This application generates database of note contents, but the database is NOT encrypted. Be sure not to save important personal data like ID, password and so on.

title: Dev pages
content:
Dev pages Important information like privacy policy on Android applications developed by mtakamur is provided on this page.
Select the application name on the menu bar to show detail on it.
